title: Pleasantly surprised
text: We arrived mid-morning and planned to leave our luggage until check-in. We were very pleased to be greeted with the news that "our room was ready". This was unexpected and truly appreciated as we could freshen up and have a coffee before heading out. The room was nicely decorated. The Ford Theatre was an easy walk and the evening reception was a nice touch, especially the "Amalfitini". Would definitly recommend the Amalfi!
